connection.connect_from: an already defined machine from where we can connect (default is local)
connection.connection_type: what protocol are we using to connect (default shh)

extra.answer: this is what we will send
extra.question: do you expect anything to be asked before the prompt

connection.load_profile: if we should load the remote profile at login. Probably ssh only (default no)
connection.prompt: prompt or empty (we will try to guess it)
connection.publickey: path to the public key (default none)
connection.timeout: how long to wait before we bailout (default 5 sec)
connection.work_dir: where to save files or empty (we will try $TMP/mind)
